statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_audits WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT facility_name, auditor_name, audit_date FROM healthcare_quality_audits WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT facility_name, auditor_name FROM healthcare_quality_audits WHERE compliance_score < 70 ORDER BY auditor_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM healthcare_quality_audits GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT MAX(compliance_score) AS highest_compliance_score, MIN(compliance_score) AS lowest_compliance_score FROM healthcare_quality_audits;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_quality_audits WHERE audit_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT facility_name, auditor_name, compliance_score FROM healthcare_quality_audits WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM healthcare_quality_audits WHERE compliance_score >= 90 GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, AVG(compliance_score) AS avg_score FROM healthcare_quality_audits GROUP BY facility_name HAVING avg_score < 80;
SELECT DISTINCT facility_name FROM healthcare_quality_audits WHERE compliance_score BETWEEN 70 AND 85 ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_id, hospital_name FROM Hospital WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT hospital_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_audits FROM Hospital JOIN AuditRecords ON Hospital.hospital_id = AuditRecords.hospital_id GROUP BY hospital_id ORDER BY number_of_audits DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT hospital_id, hospital_name FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM AuditRecords;
SELECT hospital_id, audit_date, compliance_score FROM AuditRecords WHERE compliance_score > 90 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_location FROM Hospital
SELECT hospital_id, hospital_name FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Audit WHERE audit_score > 80
SELECT hospital_name, audit_score FROM Hospital INNER JOIN Audit ON Hospital.hospital_id = Audit.hospital_id
SELECT hospital_id, hospital_name FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT audit_score, audit_date FROM Audit WHERE audit_score > 80 ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Compliance INNER JOIN Audit ON Compliance.audit_id = Audit.audit_id WHERE Compliance.compliance_type = 'HIPAA'
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_location FROM Hospital WHERE hospital_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT hospital_name, AVG(audit_score) AS average_score FROM Audit INNER JOIN Hospital ON Hospital.hospital_id = Audit.hospital_id GROUP BY Hospital.hospital_name HAVING AVG(audit_score) > 90
SELECT * FROM facilities;
SELECT facility_name, accreditation_status FROM facilities WHERE location='New York';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, compliance_rating FROM audits WHERE compliance_rating > 3;
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violations WHERE violation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, accreditation_status FROM facilities ORDER BY accreditation_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE compliance_rating > 3 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE accreditation_status = 'Accredited';
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT s.standard_name, COUNT(v.violation_id) AS total_violations FROM standards s JOIN violations v ON s.standard_id = v.audit_id GROUP BY s.standard_name ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT a.auditor_name, v.violation_description, v.violation_date FROM audits a JOIN violations v ON a.audit_id = v.audit_id WHERE a.compliance_rating IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM hospitals;
SELECT hospital_name, bed_capacity FROM hospitals;
SELECT department_name, hospital_name FROM departments JOIN hospitals ON departments.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT auditor_name, finding_description FROM auditors JOIN findings ON auditors.auditor_id = findings.audit_id;
SELECT * FROM hospitals WHERE bed_capacity > 100;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM departments JOIN hospitals ON departments.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT auditors.auditor_name, departments.department_name FROM auditors JOIN departments ON auditors.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
